Upon their respectful decline and the occasional joke exchanged, you motioned towards the living room, plopping yourself on the couch, insinuating for them to do the same. Ideas were racing in your head at this point; their flip-flopped feet were subject in your house, and you were going to at least kiss them. Because again, you were damn beautiful, and if anyone deserved Susie's and Celia's sexy feet, it was you.

Your ego began to rise again.
